item.title: Grappling with AI progress
item.description: This post is just me trying to understand what the near-term future might mean in terms of AI progress. All of this is highly personal, I’m mostly writing this to reread it in 5 years and to see how it turned out. tl;dr: I think AI becoming smart enough to replace most of today’s work in engineering and manufacturing is a possible scenario that might occur in the next decade. I have no idea what it will do to our society and life.
